Adds a page view count to a page
----
!!Parameters

__None__

----
Usage:
{{{[{ViewCounter}]}}}

__[{ViewCounter}]__

----
!!renderer.sjs
{{{data = file.getAttachment("/OpenForum/Extensions/ViewCounter","viewCount.js");
return "<DIV id='viewCounter'>--</DIV><script>pageName='"+pageName+"';\n"+data+"</script>";}}}
